extendedInfo.description: The ONE and ONLY app to Schedule,* Posts for facebook* Twitter tweets* Wall post to friends (YES its here and for free :) )* Email * SMS* Settings Scheduler to schedule flight mode,wifi,bluetooth, mobile data* Schedule Power off and Reboot (ONLY FOR ROOT USERS)* Ringer Mode scheduler for Silent, Vibrate and NormalAll features in one single app and for FREE.All the permissions required to schedule the tasks and NEVER intended to misuse user's data.Planned Features:******************  Multiple facebook,twitter and email accounts*  Repeat schedule for SMS*  Ringtone, Wallpaper schedulers*  Integrating thirdparty free web based sms service like way2sms.If you have any suggestions/issues please mail me.  *********************************            FAQ:  ********************************** Facebook is not working, what to do?Sometimes, Facebook invalidates the access_token for few security reasons, so users are advised to logout and login again to facebook or try un-install/install the app.It should work now.* I posted a tweet by mistake, how will i delete it?In 'schedules' page, long press the tweet and select 'Delete post' option to delete the tweet or post.* What are all the options available in 'schedules' screen?Select an item, you can  Clear schedule Edit schedule Delete the post, (if it is already posted) Do It Now , (if it is yet to be posted) Why failed  (to check the reason for failure)

reviews.title: Would be 5 stars...
reviews.comment: If SENT SMS\'s appeared in the native Android messaging app after they have been sent (this feature was in the older, deprecated version). This is a no-brainer. Also would love to see multiple Gmail account support & integration with Google Voice texting. Developer is extremely responsive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No errors
reviews.comment: Nothing wrong with it so far, I did have a couple errors with sending a couple of times, but the nice thing about it is that I will get a notification from my phone saying it failed to send. So I\'m not sure if it is the app or the phone. Only thing I would like to add is an alarm/message. So I can set messages with a reminder from one app. but it does what it says!
reviews.author: Colter Hicks

reviews.title: Astounding!
reviews.comment: Download IMMEDIATELY! not sure how I was ever living without this.. Well I do actually and it was by using 4 separate applications. A little bit of background.. I am musician and involved in several projects (Facebook and Twitter promo) as well as a producer ( email and sms for studio times and production notes) THIS application has worked FLAWLESSLY so far. I am rating 5 start and I would GLADLY pay 20 dollars for multiple account support for Facebook twitter and email. Thank you for this application!
reviews.author: matt soto

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Smooth UI, responsive dev, useful app. Thanks to the dev for his quick response & update.  Please add support for yahoo mail schedule.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on my S3! I used to use several apps to do everything this app does!
reviews.author: K Bell

reviews.title: EXCELLENT. Goes into the must have category!!
reviews.comment: Easy to use. I tried the rest THIS IS THE BEST. I use this to automatically turn my phone to silent at night and then back to normal in the morning. I also have the app turn on flight mode one day a week while I\'m in a two hour appointment. Using on HTC one (m7). Wish I could disable notifications that actions have been completed but the notification comes in handy sometimes. GREAT APP.
reviews.author: Matthew Morrison

reviews.title: Just What I Needed!
reviews.comment: The first reboot scheduler I have downloaded that actually does what it says and works.  I have little use for scheduling emails/texts right now, but I tested that functionality and it works as well.  This is the best scheduler I have come across and I have tried several.  This one just works!!!  Great job, developer!!!
reviews.author: Gabriel Williams

reviews.title: Sometimes works, sometimes doesn\'t
reviews.comment: I used this program to turn off my wifi connection, data connection, and to turn on airplane mode every night, and then do the reverse every morning. It succeeded about half the time.
reviews.author: Roderick Miller

reviews.title: Would rate it 5 stars is...
reviews.comment: After sending an sms it appeared in the native app for conversation history. Make sure a pro version without commercials. I\'d pay 2.99 for that but not a penny more! ;-)
reviews.author: Spacemen LIVE

reviews.title: Please
reviews.comment: I am giving 5 stars because I really love what you have done with this app but if I could make a big suggestion could you possible ly add a re occurrence portion to the app and remove the \"via tsa\" it says when posting to Facebook. Please! At the very least I would like to see recurrence feature like all the other schedule apps. Thank you!
reviews.author: Josh Marks

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: No comment needed.
reviews.author: Rameez Faure

reviews.title: Apps can\'t carry out daily reboot.
reviews.comment: I set it to reboot my phone everyday at 3am, but it only performed one reboot and ignore the rest of the days.
reviews.author: FS Lim

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Very bad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really Good
reviews.comment: It\'s really good  Only thing in my wish list is adding recurring options and also from multiple accounts...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not working
reviews.comment: i had scheduled only  restart every morning but this app didn\'t do it.
reviews.author: Sandeep Sadanandan

reviews.title: Simply superb
reviews.comment: Nice and user friendly app....  Expecting More features!
reviews.author: Sravan Kumar Mothukuri

reviews.title: Wonderful App - Galaxy 3
reviews.comment: Love this app. Wish it had start and stop dates for multiple reminders.
reviews.author: Bob Hutchings

reviews.comment: Best
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s duos
reviews.comment: Best ever app in market but there is one problem we can not send meesages to facebook friends..please fix it..but it is a must app..$$
reviews.author: Harsh Kabra

reviews.title: Davey boy
reviews.comment: Still the best schedule app
reviews.author: david hurst
